name: Herald of Slaughter
description: The Herald of Slaughter is a large fiend known for its chaotic evil nature, possessing strong physical characteristics and formidable combat abilities.
memorable: The ability to turn allies against one another with its Corrupting Aura and versatile shapechanging capabilities make it a unique and dangerous foe.
goals: To cause chaos and destruction, manipulating enemies to conflict among themselves.
relations: May be encountered with other fiends or summoned by powerful dark forces.
environment: Typically found in dark, desolate areas, potentially deep within the Abyss or other hellish realms.
strengths: High resistance and immunity to various damage types and debilitating effects, making it very tough to combat.
weaknesses: Reliant on its loyal followers to fight and can be outmaneuvered due to average Dexterity.
attacks: Employs multiattacks including a powerful Gore attack that can knock foes prone and Cleaver attacks that deal both slashing and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Corrupting Aura that forces nearby creatures to act hostile towards their allies.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception of 15, indicating it is fairly aware of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Athletics, Deception, and Persuasion, showcasing its strength and manipulation abilities.
additional_information: Innate spellcasting allows it to subtly influence minds.
Can polymorph into humanoids for deception.
Survivability bolstered by high Constitution and resistances.
spellcasting: Innate spellcaster using Charisma, capable of casting spells like Charm Person and Fear to manipulate foes.
test_queries: large malevolent fiend with shapechanging powers
creature that causes chaos among enemies
fiend specializing in manipulation and deception
brutal creature with immunity to necrotic damage
chaotic evil fiend with a powerful aura
